articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: Cannabis use associated with higher risk of heart attack and stroke, study finds - CBS News
articles.description: Whether smoked, eaten or vaporized, cannabis use is associated with increased risk of heart disease, heart attack and stroke, according to new research published in the American Heart Association's peer-reviewed journal.
articles.content:
Cannabis use  — whether smoked, eaten or vaporized — is associated with a higher number of adverse cardiovascular outcomes, according to a new study.
Published Wednesday in the Journal of the Americ… [+2667 chars]
